```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
data = 
 read_csv("fivethirtyeight_datasets/pols-month.csv", na = c("NA",".", ""))

data
```
```{r}
data |> 
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-") |> 
  mutate(
    month = month.name[as.integer(month)]
    ) |> 
  mutate(
    president = case_when(
    prez_gop == 1 ~ "gop",
    prez_dem == 1 ~ "dem"
    )) |> 
  select(-prez_gop, -prez_dem, -day)
    

```
